description: CHARISMA is the world’s leading magazine serving Spirit-filled Christians. Since 1975 the monthly publication has offered a unique blend of spiritual teaching, inspirational stories, commentary, reviews and news about what the Holy Spirit is doing around the world. CHARISMA continues to be a connective hub for the charismatic-Pentecostal community of believers and can now be found in multiple formats in print and online.  The CHARISMA Mobile app represents one of the latest platforms, providing you with up-to-the-minute breaking Christian news within the smart phone environment. Read amazing stories of people around the world being led by the Holy Spirit to make a difference in their communities. Get daily devotionals and insightful Bible studies to help you know God more intimately. Check out the latest blogs from respected leaders such as Joyce Meyer, R.T. Kendall, J. Lee Grady and Harry Jackson. And learn more about the latest Christian artists, books, CDs, DVDs and websites.  Get CHARISMA … in the palm of your hand.
